website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch dog pool that delivers a superb blend of style and function.
pros: Paw-shaped dog pool is sure to make you smile
Pool can hold up to 20 gallons of water
UV- and chew-resistant for immense toughness
Crafted from high-end truck bed liner material that guarantees the pool will maintain its appearance both now and in the future
Flexible pool is easy to drain
cons: More expensive than many comparable dog pools
May be too small for some dogs

customer_reviews.title: Best pools ever
customer_reviews.text: Best pools ever. We use them for a large dog boarding facility. These pools get there butts kicked year round and they hold up like no other. We have the bones and the small blue paw. We have had the bone shaped pools for years and they are still perfect. All pools have been enjoyed by over a thousand dogs a year while being used for about 3 hours a day and no damage at all. These could be used for anything including a awesome kiddie pool for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cespedes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pool or Gigantic Water Bowl?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a sturdy, rugged dog pool. My dog isn`t a digger or a chewer, so I don`t know how it would handle that, but it isn`t a cheap kiddy pool. I bought this size so my 60lb boxer could cool off and splash around with her toys & maybe some ice cubes. There is room for her to do that & to lay down, but she can`t do a full body stretch. She has room to lay down comfortably. I`ve seen 3-4 husky/lab dogs fit in the bone shaped pool, so i figured that might be too big for her alone. This will meet our goals if I can convince her it`s not a giant water bowl, ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dogs... Great for pigs too!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 250 lb pot bellied pig who I have had a very hard time trying to find a pool for that would last him more than a week or two. He punctures the bottom of most pools with his hooves and, because of his short legs and low hanging belly, the pool has to have low sides that are both sturdy and flexible so he can get in and out easily without hurting himself or crushing the sides. This pool is awesome!! I'm going to be able to clean it up, store it away and use again next year, and probably many more years after that!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wenk

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this pool! He's a German Shephard ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this pool! He's a German Shephard and he fits in it.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Tough little dog pool
customer_reviews.text: My puppy could tear up a cheap plastic pool faster than you could fill it up with water ! So I decided to shell out the cash for this sturdy built pool. it has not disappointed. I am also impressed at how flexible it is when you need to empty it. If I could have changed anything , I would have made it slightly larger. But the only other size option was significantly larger , requiring to much water to fill .
customer_reviews.author: Dog Sense

customer_reviews.title: My Pot Belly Pig thanks you!!! Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pot bellied pig. This is just perfect for her. The sides are low enough for her to lift her legs to get in and big enough for her to lay down in. I know it's expensive . But I feel like this will last for years VS a kiddy pool ...
customer_reviews.author: N. Walker

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it. One of my dogs is scared to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. One of my dogs is scared to get into our pool, but will sit in his doggy pool. Update 5/1/2109: The doggy pool performed well through the entire season, which is long in Texas. I will bring it back out in a week. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well made, sturdy, and easy to clean! My little Morkie loves to play in this pool!
customer_reviews.author: NRobertson

customer_reviews.title: It’s too small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after reading several reviews. I have a lab and this pool is Yorkie size! It’s only big enough to wet her paws and not even big enough for my dogter to sit in! Wish I hadn’t gotten it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wall

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog pool
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog pool. It is perfect and meets all of my expectations. Definitely recommend it. I have 2 pugs and it is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Randa919

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: I give it one star because it’s so tiny and cost way too much for such s small pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog poked he's in 3 hard mastic pools every year. Not this one. Perfe t.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! My puppy chews on it but its sturdy! Perfect size for my two french bulldogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my dogs love it! Built a deck for it. Real cute!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Hole chewed
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 weeks my bulldog chewed a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Shop around to save!
customer_reviews.text: This paw pool is white not blue and though material is heavy it is not flexible as stated. Save your money ($30) and shop around. Even the UPC label indicates white. This was purchased for a fund raiser to fill with items and use as a raffle basket and don't have time to return otherwise I would on principal just because blue was desired! It is made tough and should last, but if I would have known it was white I saw other listings for $99!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Manka

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Advertisement VERY deceitful as advertised! Very VERY small...i,would not even call this a pool! Too small for a cat!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it way to expensive for tiny pool
customer_reviews.text: Very small pool. My golden retriever will not fit in it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We run a dog daycare and bought two of these. They've lasted longer than anything else so far. Been two years and still look new! Great for dogs 20lbs and under. The bone shaped one is awesome for the bigger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Krampe

product_meta.title: One Dog One Bone BPP02 Paw Shaped Dog Pool Made with Heavy Duty Truck Bed Liner Material Flexes like a paw for easy draining, Small, Blue
product_meta.description: Blue Paw Shaped Dog Pool. Made with Heavy Duty Truck Bed Liner Material. Flexes like a paw for easy draining
feature_bullets: Blue Paw Shaped Play Pool for Dogs
Made with Heavy Duty Truck Bed Liner Material
Flexes like a paw for easy draining
